app.title: WE APP will be launched soon, New interface revision, Chat system, Table collection, Follow the dealers and many other new features
content: NEW WE APP
The WE team has spent a year developing the new app lobby and game interface, using native code to let you experience WE products on iOS / Android smoothly!

In the new version of the APP interface we offer a richer lobby table display and the ability to follow WE official news at the same time, follow the beautiful dealers and lucky table collection. We have also improved the live baccarat betting interface and added new games such as Super Draw, Panda 8, Dragon 7, Super 6, Banker Dragon Bonus, Player Dragon Bonus. Up to 50 tables are available in the WE APP, including live, blockchain, lottery, sports and the industry's first multi-game betting feature.

【New Baccarat interface】【Multi-table betting function】【New chat system】【Favourite tables】【Follow the dealers】【Good road betting】【Quick search】【My preferences】【Reward the dealers】【Automatic game quality check】【Automatic app authentication】
